results.title: Ask an Australian about government [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Describes the democratic government framework existing in Australia, covering its historical development, voting provisions, elections, and the respective Federal, State and Local government powers. Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about flora and fauna [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: An introduction to the flowers, animals and birds of Australia, highlighting the role of national parks and sanctuaries in the preservation of native shrubs, flowers and creatures, and stressing the laws covering the protection of fauna and flora. Note: In Turkish.
